Start: ^"Felix! You must listen to me. Danger is approaching Foxhaven."
^"Danger? Please, little bird, I am invincible. Nothing can harm me."
^"But I've seen shady characters lurking on the outskirts of town. They mean to bring harm."
^"I've faced worse than a few shady characters. My flames will make quick work of them."
^"You underestimate the threat, Felix. Please, heed my warning."
^"Your concern is touching, but unnecessary. Now, if you'll <color=#359BE3>excuse me</color>, I have mischief to attend to."
